TableView.Query_Where: PUCT_TABLE_ID = 'PRINT_PREFIX_V' and PUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and PUCT_TYPE2_CD='%PRODUCT_CD%' and PUCT_TYPE3_CD='%SCHEME_ID%'

SCHEME_ID = '%SCHEME_ID%' and PRODUCT_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%' and EFFECTIVE_DT = (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM %REGION%.POL_BIL_METHOD WHERE PRODUCT_CD = A.PRODUCT_CD AND SCHEME_ID = A.SCHEME_ID AND EFFECTIVE_TYPE_CD = A.EFFECTIVE_TYPE_CD AND BILL_PLAN_CODE = A.BILL_PLAN_CODE and HISTORY_VLD_NBR = 0)

SCHEME_ID= '%SCHEME_ID%' and MASTER_COMPANY_NBR = '%MASTER_COMPANY_NBR%' and EFFECTIVE_DT = ((SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM %REGION%.SHM_CONTRACT WHERE SCHEME_ID = A.SCHEME_ID AND HISTORY_VLD_NBR = 0))

SCHEME_ID= '%SCHEME_ID%' and PRODUCT_CD= '%PRODUCT_CD%' AND EFFECTIVE_DT = (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM %REGION%.SHM_COVER WHERE PRODUCT_CD = A.PRODUCT_CD AND SCHEME_ID = A.SCHEME_ID AND SHM_COV_CD = A.SHM_COV_CD AND HISTORY_VLD_NBR = 0)

SCHEME_ID = '%SCHEME_ID%' and PRODUCT_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%' and EFFECTIVE_DT = (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) from %REGION%.SHM_PRODUCT_INFO where A.SCHEME_ID = SCHEME_ID and A.PRODUCT_CD = PRODUCT_CD and A.COVER_CD = COVER_CD and A.INFO_TYP_CD = INFO_TYP_CD)
MASTER_COMPANY_NBR = '%MASTER_COMPANY_NBR%' and SCHEME_ID = '%SCHEME_ID%' and POL_SYMBOL_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%' and LOB_CD = '%LOB_CD%'
SUCT_TABLE_ID='SHM_CONV_PREFIX_V' and INSURANCE_LINE_CD ='%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
SUCT_TABLE_ID='SHM_TRAVEL_AREA_V' and INSURANCE_LINE_CD ='%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
SUCT_TABLE_ID='SHM_TRV_DURATION_V' and INSURANCE_LINE_CD ='%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
SUCT_TABLE_ID='SHM_TRV_MED_QUES_V' and INSURANCE_LINE_CD ='%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID ='PARTNER_XFR_PRD_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID ='SHM_LET_PRP_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID ='SHM_PROD_SLYURL_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'

SCHEME_ID = '%SCHEME_ID%' and PRODUCT_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%' AND EFFECTIVE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM %REGION%.THIRD_PARTY_FEES WHERE PRODUCT_CD = A.PRODUCT_CD AND SCHEME_ID = A.SCHEME_ID AND COVERAGE_CD = A.COVERAGE_CD AND VARIABLE_CD = A.VARIABLE_CD AND COV_OPT_TYP_CD = A.COV_OPT_TYP_CD)
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_BUS_TRIP_FRQ_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUM_BUS_DIST_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUM_FRQ_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUM_FRQ_WKLY_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUM_PAS_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUM_TIME_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_CUR_COV_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_DRV_FRQ_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_OCC_ENTERTN_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_OCC_SPORTS_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_ROAD_TYP_LIT_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'
INSURANCE_LINE_CD = '%LOB_CD%' and SUCT_TABLE_ID = 'SHM_TERMS_IMP_V' and SUCT_TYPE1_CD = '%SCHEME_ID%' and SUCT_TYPE2_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%'

SCHEME_ID = '%SCHEME_ID%' and XCS_POL_SYM_CD = '%PRODUCT_CD%' and EFFECTIVE_DT = (SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DT) FROM %REGION%.VEH_XCS_AMOUNT_LIT WHERE XCS_POL_SYM_CD = A.XCS_POL_SYM_CD AND SCHEME_ID = A.SCHEME_ID AND XCS_TYPE_CD = A.XCS_TYPE_CD AND XCS_AMT_ORD_NBR = A.XCS_AMT_ORD_NBR)
MASTER_COMPANY_NBR ='%MASTER_COMPANY_NBR%' AND POL_SYMBOL_CD ='%PRODUCT_CD%' AND SCHEME_ID in('%SCHEME_ID%','999')
